description: 18-year-old also faces child sex offence charges and appears in court today.
title: Bradford: Saltaire teenager charged with rape
title_page: Bradford: Saltaire teenager charged with rape - BBC News
maintext:
A teenager has been charged with multiple rapes and child sex offences, West Yorkshire Police have confirmed.
Christopher Johnson, 18, of Katherine Street, Saltaire, is accused of three counts of rape.
He also faces one count of engaging in sexual communications with a child and three counts of possession of indecent images of children.
He was due to appear at Bradford Magistrates' Court today after his arrest by the Bradford district safeguarding team.
Listen to highlights from West Yorkshire on BBC Sounds, catch up with the latest episode of Look North or tell us a story you think we should be covering here, external.
